titles.title: Train More Primary Care Doctors Act of 2025
Train More Primary Care Doctors Act of 2025
To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize funding for grants and contracts for primary care training and enhancement, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Train More Primary Care Doctors Act of 2025
This bill reauthorizes through FY2030 the Health Resources and Services Administrationâ€™s Primary Care Training and Enhancement program, which provides various grants to entities such as hospitals and schools for enhancing training and education for the primary care workforce.
